attributes.action: Extend Free Covid19 parking For NHS workers
attributes.additional_details:
We Health care workers fighting every day with hospital, please give us at least free parking as did before(C19 free parking permit), as we have different time shifts starting and ending duty. After fighting with this pandemic it’s very difficult to catch public transport. Our hospital Staff parking spaces are very limited area. Now the Indian variant have been hitting in our area, and we are struggling. We have noticed from 20th of June 2021 C19 parking permit is no longer valid. Kindly extend this service and treat us.

Thanks
attributes.background:
We have noticed from 20th of June 2021 C19 parking permit is no longer valid. Kindly extend this service and treat health care workers.

Thanks

departments.name: Department of Health and Social Care

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/587441

If you just want a temporary extension to arrangements for free parking during the current pandemic, we could accept a petition requesting this, but it would need to be clear how long you wanted this to be extended for.
